Build the building Materials

Build the building Materials Export Situation Remains Vigilant Variable Speed

Although China's foreign trade exports are showing distributes from good Qu Shi, Dan Shi Building China's exports Zhi Lu Chan Pin Ye Hennan with Wen Ding Lai Xing Rong, Buduanchuxian of trade Moca, Fan-dumping Deng Shi Jian good interpretation of the power balance Zhe 1 o'clock, Jin Ri facing our country Taocixingye Huo largest anti-dumping case is also a good trade for the market to cast a shadow, such a situation, building materials, foreign trade enterprises still need to guard against foreign market variables.
Still need to guard against foreign market variables
Insiders pointed out that, although foreign trade continued to rise, but short-term downturn in the situation inside and outside the required converting a qualitative change in the way of foreign trade still do not rise steadily. Currently, the world economy is in a critical stage power balance bracelet to reverse the economic recovery is still uneven, the conditions for sustainable growth is still fragile.
Although the building materials industry in the ongoing foreign markets rebound came the voice, but the foreign market instability arising in business also requires attention. Foreign trade enterprises should fully assess the complexity of the market, grim and uncertain, the various difficulties and risks into account, to respond to the challenges of doing more solid, the first time to trade in volatile markets factors make a deal, so take the building materials enterprises in foreign trade routes still wary.
States should be backed power balance wristband up by foreign trade enterprises market
In recent years, the market for foreign trade enterprises for foreign trade caused by market shocks, has several of the foreign trade enterprises to adjust export tax rebate and to the good harvest results. In my opinion, continue to implement good policies related to foreign trade enterprises to the road of building materials to bring more power, not only conducive to the development of enterprises, are also conducive to the rapid progress of power balance bracelet China's foreign trade business. Can be said is that foreign trade enterprises of the road, the state is the true market backing.
How to maintain the current warming trend of foreign trade, we must continue to optimize the trade structure and support qualified enterprises to develop technology transfer and technological upgrading activities. According to industry sources, the most important to keep power balance policy steady. Since last year, to continue to overcome the international financial crisis and issued a series of policies for export tax rebates, export credit insurance, trade credit guarantees and loans, institutional policy development should be long-standing and gradually improve and strengthen.

Proposal to Create Cross-border Financing Mechanisms

Proposal to Create Cross-border Financing Mechanisms

However, from the current China - ASEAN free trade zone in China, promoting the situation, and did not fully play to their strengths. Xu Ningning, said: "The main reason is for 'free trade' wholesale power balance wristband concept, most companies still know little about China, many Chinese companies still do not know why the free trade thing, but do not know the rules of free trade."
At the forum, representatives from the ASEAN countries for the development of SMEs in a lot of experience and recommendations. International companies from the Singapore Ministry of Trade and Industry Secretary Michael chang Minister on, although the land area of Singapore is very small, resource-poor, but because Singapore has always been open to trade, so that SMEs have great development space.
Michael chang said, Singapore's only resource is human resources, the Government in the development of wholesale power balace bracelet human resources at all costs. Not only benefits the new government organized by the Government a lot of manpower training, and also held a number of business seminars and symposia, free of charge to small and medium enterprises to participate, "Through these initiatives, Singapore's SMEs to strengthen the regional cooperation, a number of small enterprises gradually grow into a variable medium. "
Chinese Ministry of Commerce spokesman Yao Jian said here on the 12th, the next few months, the debt crisis of Europe's exports to China the negative effects may gradually.
For the current problem power balance wristband of financing SMEs in common, the Cambodian industry, Mines and Energy deputy director of the Soem Nara said that countries should together form a set of SME financing mechanisms, such cooperation is not only within the practice in Cambodia, the world's financial organization should support.
Yao Jian said that in January 2010 to May, China's exports to the EU rose by 34.4% by the debt crisis in Europe has not yet appeared. As the orders from the contract signing, delivery to the export of foreign exchange, at least 2 months or even longer, in May export figures reflect power balance bracelet March orders prior to the contract.
Customs statistics show that a few days ago, in May increased by 48.5% of Chinese exports, trade surplus of 19.53 billion U.S. dollars that month.
Yao Jian, said in May month, China's foreign trade surplus despite a big increase, but the economy continues power balance to rebound as China to expand imports from the policy effects will emerge, and imports will continue to maintain high growth, the size of the trade surplus is expected to be evident year down.

To Carry Out a Dialogue to Resolve Trade Friction

To Carry Out a Dialogue to Resolve Trade Friction

Industry Injury Investigation Bureau of Ministry of Commerce yesterday held in the deep "to maintain industrial safety training," said Secretary Yangyi in training, the current international trade protectionism and economic nationalism prevailed, the world has entered a period of high trade frictions.
YANG Yi analysis, financial crisis, developed countries, found that employment is the most important economic issue, and thus pay more attention to manufacturing and export trade, and to take various measures to protect their own markets, Daozhi increasingly fierce global trade disputes, have adopted the currency devaluation, increased tariffs, import restrictions, subsidies and technical barriers to trade and other means to protect their own industries. According to World Bank statistics, since the financial crisis, the lady gaga earphones G20 has launched a total of 17 countries about 78 trade protectionist measures, of which 47 have been implemented.
In Yangyi view, trade protectionism, state intervention is the core of trade, restrictions on foreign goods, services, and the factors involved in their market competitiveness, trade protectionism can only break the pattern of distribution of interests and mutual benefit, not only to help their economic growth, but also help improve their employment. Last year in September U.S. safeguard measures implemented in China's tire, for example, which directly led to China's tire exports to U.S. decline in a row 5 months, to great damage to China's tire industry, while the U.S. did not benefit from the fact that although increased surface the jobs, but the actual maximum harm the interests of American consumers. According to statistics, the United States to take safeguard measures tire, each protecting a job, it will be another loss of 25 jobs, while U.S. consumers pay for every year from 600 million to seven hundred million U.S. dollars.
In the period of high international trade protection, the Chinese how to deal? YANG Yi that China will become the biggest victim of trade protectionism, trade frictions situation is more severe. China's export products in overseas markets continued to suffer in recent years, wholesale lady gaga headphones China has become the world's 15 consecutive years the focus of anti-dumping investigation. The face of growing trade frictions, YANG Yi suggested that China should concentrate more on applying international common Guize maintain industrial safety; In addition to actively carry out trade Dui Hua, to resolve trade frictions; Tongshi to strengthen the trade remedies and related policy coordination, industry Sun Hai Jiang Hua The preventive role of early warning mechanisms; enterprises will have to be good at the operation of trade remedy measures to lady gaga headphones protect themselves, encounter friction, to learn to respond actively.

Wenzhou Shoe Exports Rose For Five Consecutive Months

Wenzhou Shoe Exports Rose For Five Consecutive Months

June 7 hearing, Wenzhou shoe enterprises export usher in a new peak, which Jindi Shoes single month more than 10 million U.S. dollars export value, giant of a group nearly 10 million U.S. dollars export value.
Wenzhou Inspection and Quarantine, according to statistics, in May of this year exports of 62,545,700 lady gaga headphones pairs of shoes in Wenzhou, a total of 296 million U.S. dollars, respectively, compared with the same period last year growth of 46.73%, 54.12%. This is the Wenzhou footwear exports rose 5 consecutive months, an increase of apparent V-shaped curve, the highest rate of increase of 1,5 month, the lowest increase in March. The number of exporters has also seen substantial growth, growth from the original 654 to 754, of which top 30 export companies in 24 footwear enterprises to achieve a positive growth of exports of these 30 companies totaled 81.2959 million U.S. dollars about 28% of the total in May, while the number of enterprises in less than 4%.
Wenzhou inspection and quarantine department of the relevant parties, to achieve substantial growth in exports of Wenzhou shoes very obvious reason is because the economy pick up, orders increased significantly. Spring, the exported more busy, have to expand capacity to meet wholesale lady gaga headphones customer recruitment needs, many enterprises are too many orders to reflect endless, some orders had to give up. Wenzhou shoes to the EU, U.S., Croatia, South Africa, Japan and other major export markets, exports have maintained good momentum, but last year due to customs clearance and currency devaluation gray double blow of Russia and Ukraine have also made substantial growth in exports. In addition, Wenzhou shoe their competitive edge adapted to changes in consumer demand. Wenzhou shoe competitive mainly in the direct docking consumer terminals, accurate and timely information for the consumer market. The chain are complete and the product structure of the regional advantages, so that the leading products of Wenzhou shoe and textile surface of synthetic leather shoes, shoes maintain a rapid growth rate.
In addition to the increased market demand, Wenzhou shoe enterprises also pay more attention to the improvement of its own power. Zhu Jian-Yong description, business situation and the lady gaga earphones policies followed by the European Union, early use of environmentally friendly shoes, and the quality of efforts in the shoes, so shoes in the European Union has a strong market competitiveness. In addition, the company has been Wenzhou customs and inspection and quarantine departments support and priority access to the Customs AA category management business and export inspection exemption qualifications, have certain advantages in exports.

2010 iron ore talks still have not seen the results, the three mines has exported wind through the third quarter iron ore will increase by 30-35%. At this point, Frank Hugh Smith promised on behalf of the African mining of iron ore sold to China, discount move, unusual concern. false eyelashes African mining industry this year in January and signed a framework agreement of iron materials, supplies of iron to be 244 million U.S. dollars to acquire its 12.5% shareholding, and imports from the company millions of tons of ore per year. For the latest progress of the deal, Frank said Hugh Smith, "the African mining and iron materials have completed the signing of all contracts, and now just waiting for the Chinese government approval."
Due to exchange rate wholesale concealer changes, the final shares in the amount of iron materials will reach 280 million U.S. dollars. From 2011, a year of iron materials from the African mining companies to import 5 million tons to 800 tons of hematite, at least 20 years. In addition, China will also start from the latter from 2013 imports of 10 million tons of magnetite ore.
"Compared with China's annual iron ore imports, the total production of Africa's mining industry is still limited. wholesale ipod nano However, including Guinea and other places, including, Africa has rich resources, could become an important resource base for imports." My steel Network analyst Xu Xiangchun said.
Currently, the African mining of magnetite produced is not high grade, only 30%, three grade iron ore mine to 50% or 60%, there is a clear gap between the two. However, expert analysis, wholesale ipod touch fewer impurities African mining, mining and low cost, offshore costs very competitive.
To make clothing and wool products have a better feel, many domestic manufacturers will use in the production process polyoxyethylene alkylphenol ethers (APEO), but APEO have greater toxicity, wholesale ipod touch 16gb biodegradation of relatively weak sex, a greater impact on humans and the environment. Thus, clothing exports to the EU must pay attention to the content of the problem APEO.

Outward Expansion to Solve the Problem of Resources

Outward Expansion to Solve the Problem of Resources

Shortage of oil resources in the supply chain difficulties facing shortage of gas supply
In recent years, occurred in the southern China region, "shortage of oil" events, so as one of the largest state-owned energy group of the oil to speed up its "going out" pace.
Recently, CNPC wholesale ipod touch 16gb eneral manager Jiang Jiemin announced that PetroChina has drawn 60 billion U.S. dollars of overseas investment plan to ensure that planning period up to 200 million tons of overseas oil and gas output target. In 2020, domestic oil and natural gas will reach 600 million tons of annual demand, the oil will contribute 400 million tons, half of which came from overseas oil and gas operations.
However, look for oil overseas in the oil path is full of hardships. To the Sudan, for example, 15 years ago, wholesale ipod touch are looking for quality overseas oil resources in the oil and the Sudanese government signed a cooperation agreement, with hundreds of millions of money only in exchange for the future stability of oil supply.
Despite an early start on the future oil supply of oil distribution, but in China to double-digit economic wholesale ipod nano context of rapid development, "shortage of oil", "gas shortage" event after another, or to the pressure of heavy oil. Combined with natural gas in recent years has become the main business of oil, so the effective protection for the oil and gas supply, has become a major challenge facing the oil.
As an oil company, to set up their own fleet, obviously not realistic. Thus, the oil will be taken and in the sea, and other well-known shipping company COSCO signed a transportation agreement wholesale concealer in advance of measures to solve the transportation problem.
May 18, 2010, CNPC announced the "China Petroleum (10.69,0.06,0.56%) in the Sudan," the report. Report revealed that 3-7 projects in Sudan, the Western major oil companies have been prospecting for years no major commercial discovery, but after taking over the oil, go for exploration in 2003 discovered the world's largest oil field Faro economic field, and reserves have been discovered, Mo Lita hundred million ton reserves of oil and more than 10 million-ton oil field.
International Energy Agency false eyelashes predicted that China's dependence on international oil market if the current rate of increase by 2020 will reach 75%. International relations with China the most intimate of Sudan and the Middle East will contribute to future major force in China's oil imports.
Initially, many experts are not good in the domestic oil investments in Sudan. "There has been war in the Sudan, the political risk is very great." A Ministry of Land and the expert told reporters.
In order to allow Sudan's oil fields can provide a stable supply of oil, the oil in the local donated tens of wholesale false eyelashes millions of dollars to support local anti-poverty and welfare programs, in order to resolve the residents do not trust the foreign oil companies.

The Foreign Trade

The Foreign Trade

Overseas oil sources is in a stable supply of oil to protect the first step, to safely transported for domestic crude oil, is also a challenge.
In Sudan, CNPC signed an agreement with the early days of China's imports of crude oil in more than 90% still dependent on foreign oil tanker traffic. For the oil, the use of foreign oil tankers wholesale ipod touch 16gb there are many uncertainties, one of the most important thing is that oil is a strategic material, Employment of the Foreign tankers means that dozens of days in the sea of oil or controlled by foreign enterprises, while in control efforts in their own little oil. Now, when oil from Sudan false eyelashes and other overseas oilfields oil tanker traffic through the domestic shipping arrived in a Chinese port, the oil was finally able to breathe, at least there are many uncontrollable forces have successfully repelled by it.
Timely adjustments to wholesale false eyelashes demand, the oil started to increase in southern areas of the expansion of refinery capacity. In fact, in recent years took place in the South of China tight supply of refined oil "shortage of oil" incident, so that two oil companies began oil refinery capacity race.

Supply of Natural Gas and Challenges

Supply of Natural Gas and Challenges

Different with Sinopec, CNPC of China, the majority of oil from the northern regions, especially the major oil producer and refinery are located in the northwest and northeast. As in recent years, competition for the South of oil refined oil retail business, logistics, supply wholesale ipod touch 16gb problems have become more urgent.
North oil south become a major challenge facing the oil. Although the oil has its own trucking company, based in Xinjiang, and also have a logistics base in Shanghai, but the transit time and transportation costs are in the oil have to consider.
In recent years, demand for wholesale ipod touch the timely adjustment, oil started to increase in southern areas of the expansion of refining capacity. Compared with Sinopec, CNPC in logistics information to pressure is relatively small. Sinopec's main covered market, wholesale concealer the Yangtze River Delta, Pearl River Delta and other economically developed areas, the supply of refined oil is very complex, and in the oil market is relatively simple. In the oil field, although in those firms in the oil Sinopec, but the supply of natural gas in the main business, the oil is also facing great difficulties.
In the oil business in the false eyelashes field of oil supply difficulties encountered in its emerging businesses - natural gas field problem also exists.
